hero.title: Famland
hero.subtitle: Discover your family history, create a visual family tree and preserve heritage for future generations

features.sectionSubtitle: Complete set of tools for creating, maintaining and preserving your family history

tree.title: Family Tree
tree.description: Create detailed family relationship charts with unlimited generations

history.title: Family History
history.description: Record stories, important events and achievements of each family member

archive.title: Photo Archive
archive.description: Upload and organize family photos, linking them to specific people and events

geography.title: Family Geography
geography.description: Mark places of birth, life and important events on an interactive map

timeline.title: Event Timeline
timeline.description: Keep a calendar of family dates, anniversaries and important historical moments

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Invite relatives to jointly fill and edit the family tree

heritage.title: Preserve Family Heritage
heritage.description: Every family has a unique story. Our platform helps you collect, organize and pass this invaluable information to future generations.
